room.name: a clearing in the forest
room.short_description: This is a clearing in the middle of a forest
room.long_description: To all sides except south, there is thick dense forest. South of you is an ominous stone archway. To the west there is a dirty bathtub

room.name: The stone arch
room.short_description: A stone arch marks the entrance to a thick wooded forest
room.long_description: A stone arch is to the north of you. Down behind you are several hundred holes, too deep to see the bottom of

room.name: The forest spa
room.short_description: A clawfoot bathtub sits in a forest
room.long_description: This is just a piece of forest with a bathtub in it. In the distance you can see a stone temple sort of thingy. I would probably head north and check it out

room.name: The stone temple exterior
room.short_description: A large structure with impressive stone gargoyles atop its turrets
room.long_description: You are outside a temple made out of stone

room.name: A deep dark hole
room.short_description: You have fallen into a dark hole
room.long_description: Oh no. you have fallen into a deep dark hole and your ankle is really sprained now. Luckily there is a ladder that you can use.

room.name: inside of temple
room.short_description: You are now inside of the stone temple
room.long_description: You're inside of the stone temple. It is dusty and hard to breathe ... the walls seem to be crumbling

item.name: rock
item.desc: a dirty rock. it has 'stanley yelnats' carved into it.

item.name: gentle snake
item.desc: he will not bite you. he likes to ride on shoulders and be worn like that.

item.name: master sword
item.desc: A sword made of surgical steel. It looks pointy, sharp, and dangerous. There is a triforce symbol engraved at it's base

item.name: soap spell
item.desc: alacazam! zoo wee mama! you're clean now. thank god, you smelled really bad before.

item.name: bean
item.desc: A little kidney bean. You could probably toss it around, or eat it
